## PlayerCameraEventPayloads."PLAYER\_CAMERA.SET\_VIEW\_MODEL\_HIDDEN\_NODES" property

Emitted when the nodes of the view model are set to be hidden.

**Signature:**

        playerCamera: PlayerCamera;
